title: Strengthening Software Development Competencies: Pre-Service Teacher Orientation for Online Learning Success

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can independently navigate a mobile LMS (basic functions) within one week
Learners can apply online learning time management and motivation strategies to actual classes
Learners can form learning communities by communicating with three or more peer teachers in mobile environments
Learners can identify and utilize five or more essential digital resources related to language education job tasks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
